If you want to make your iPhone/iPad more convenient, If you want to take as much photos videos as you can in your life, for yourself, babies, pets, If you want to transfer files, photos, videos among different computers, iPhone, iPad, but you don’t like iTunes, or there is no internet or WiFi, If you want to watch favorite movies or listen music in the journey, Then this photo stick for iPhone is Perfect for you. Yeah, this iPhone memory is a perfect Partner for your iPhone/iPad. NOTE: 1, For a better experience, please remove the iPhone protective cases if necessary before using this photo stick for iPhone. 2, Due to DRM (Digital Rights Management), we cannot transfer Music or Video files in iTunes or downloaded by the 3rd APP to this iPhone storage. Take this Photo Stick for iPhone, share your favorite photos, videos, documents to friends or families easily. Also you can transfer these files to other iOS devices quickly while no Internet or WiFi required. This photo stick for iPhone make the distance among you and friends more closely~.~ The photo stick for iPhone could be really helpful for those who have an iPhone or iPad without a large or sufficient storage. Take this iPhone storage, free up photos videos from your iPhone (so easy and fast), then go to take lots of pictures and videos on your upcoming vacation or to an event/festival where you might take a lot of photos videos and you can fill up the external iPhone flash drive instead of your iPhone storage. TIPS: Plug the iPhone storage, taking Photos/Videos from the APP, all Photos & Videos Will be Stored in the iPhone Flash Drive directly.

Due to DRM (Digital Rights Management), we cannot transfer Music or Video files in iTunes or downloaded by the 3rd APP to this iPhone storage. iPhone external storage DOES NOT support the latest version of 12.9 inch iPad Pro and 11 inch iPad Pro which with Type-c port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works flawlessly! Get one to backup those photos!
reviews.reviewText: Love my iPhone, but why is so troublesome to backup photos to a PC!? Installed the app. App is easy to use. The backup function for photos grabs all photos from your various folders which makes it simple. I made sure all photos transferred successfully to my PC and were viewable, before deleting the pics from my iPhone. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, exactly what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: I needed to organize photos. Before I started messing with them, I wanted them all backed up, and quickly. This did the job. It pulled my photos off my phone easily, and with little fuss. Now, I feel better about pushing some to my backup server and some to a drive in the safety deposit box (I'm a genealogist, so I need backups). I read a couple of reviews that said it made their phone run hot, but it didn't do that in my case. I plan to keep using this as I accumulate photos. It's the one tool I never knew I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Never had such a relaxing feeling while moving the photos and videos. It was so simple and faster in copying the files….Still the experience can be improved like after copying to you want to delete the files option can be given to the user so that one action both the task gets completed. Still worth of buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just got this in the mail today. I immediately opened it and went to work. In two and a half hours it had downloaded my 25,000+ pictures and my 1,000+ videos all on one 128GB stick. Yes, the stick is now basically full so I will have to purchase another one for the future. I am not a techie, but I did not find it difficult to download. The instruction booklet seems thick and I was nervous based on reviews I read, but there is one direction per tiny page in the booklet along with a color photo! Don't hesitate - place your order today! You will not be sorry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AS GOOD AS IT SEEMS!!!
reviews.reviewText: I’m not kidding when I say that I have ALWAYS struggled with storage issues on my phone. I have over 20,000 photos and 980 videos on my phone. My issue is that I’m not comfortable only relying on google photos or investing in cloud storage. I’ve always wanted to take my photos off and put them on external storage. For years I’ve tried to copy and transfer them with no success. The photos were always corrupted or it simply didn’t work.I saw this product in a TikTok and believed it was probably too good to be true but at this point, I had nothing left to lose so I ordered one. It is amazing. I was quickly able to load almost all of my photos onto this device and then put them all on my external hard drive for safe keeping!! I can finally use my phone again and I’m thrilled!!My only complaint is that I was only able to load 19,000 photos to the device as it did crash when I tried to load all of them. I’ll probably just remove some photos and then get the rest of them off another day! Other than that, it’s perfect. It’s so easy to use and is WELL worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This was quite difficult (stubborn little thing) to use. At first, I thought it would be simple, so I just stuck the thing in my iphone 11 and attempted to transfer files over to the stick, then over to my laptop. I did not delete anything on my phone in case anything goes wrong. To my surprise, it did not transfer all of it (343 out of 2438 photos/vids). Looking at the instructions, there are just too many pages to go through. I do not have time to read it as I have family over and I need the space on my phone for videos and pics. Those precious moments means no time's a wastin'! When I quickly scanned through the little booklet, I read "formatting", and so I did. That seemed to do the trick as it transferred MOST of the pics. I copied/pasted the files into my laptop's hard drive, went over the pics on BOTH my laptop and phone. If I see any of the photos/vids that were transferred, I deleted them off my phone. So it's good at this point. Problem is...the stick did not pick up ALL of my iphone pics. I've repeated this process with just the photos; for some reason the video files have changed its properties on my laptop's hard drive, but that is my doing and I've solved it (this has a lot to do with the programs your computer already have and NOTHING to do with the stick). I then painstakingly worked on the video files next on my phone and made a separate folder in my laptop's hard drive. This trick seems to work with me; it might be different for others. So far...so good. It's a pain, but I seriously need the space on my phone, like right now.Next thing on my list of problems is ejecting the stick off my laptop. Because it automatically backs up into my Dropbox -- which I'm trying to get out of cause it's a pain -- it takes FOREVER to eject the stick. I do not know how to turn off this feature, but I'm pretty sure someone out there has figured it out.As you can see, I can be quite impatient for something that is SUPPOSED to be easy to use and if it requires a lot of reading, then there's too much time being wasted.Three stars for:- photo transferring is pretty quick- once you get the hang of it and figure it out, then it's golden- convenienceMinus two stars for:- a booklet that can turn into a novel- not as easy as it seems- having to be creative with the way my computer and the stick communicate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use
reviews.reviewText: very simple and easy to use. cleared up alot 0f space on my phone. definitely recommend getting one of these if you need more storage for photos
Very easy to use! Well explained directions. Highly recommended for saving space on IPhone

reviews.reviewText: Unlike others i have bought this one works very well! Photos can easily be saved onto the device and viewed as well.
The media could not be loaded. Habe diesen kleinen Fotos, die von meinen Kindern geschenkt bekommen. Bin begeistert.
Mi è molto piaciuto perché è molto bello ed elegante, il materiale è ottimo. È facilissimoDa utilizzare e funzione molto bene. È ilProdotto migliore nel suo genere. Lo consiglio a tutti.
